text: 2.23: Sng 7.9; 62.12; Jer 11.20; 17.10; Ro 8.27; 2 Ko 5.10; 2 T 4.14; VB 20.12-13Anan tari vhɨra, gu mbe shogɨrim, mbe vhɨzgirga. Gu maaŋ muuŋgirga, mba siosi za kaŋgirga, gu tuituigira gumgi ndavi vheri gum mben ndɨkndɨgi gari. Gu nde bevbevira mba mbui tɨvi tugɨratɨgɨp nta suaŋv vhezar za nden nɨɨŋgirga.
